name: baked  creamy  cream cheese and dried cranberry sauce
desc: this is so easy and delicious!
steps: ['cut the dried cranberries into small chunks', 'mix cream cheese , cranberries and sugar in a bowl', 'spread this mixture on top of the dried cranberries', 'cook a bit in the oven to soften the cranberries', 'if the cranberries start to burn , place them in a paper bag and let them cool a bit', 'dont cook them , just take them out of the bag and pack them down into your crockpot and place them in a bowl and pour the hot cream cheese mixture over them', 'cook on low for 6 hours or on high for 2 hours', 'serve with crackers or crackers with cheese on top']
